title.rendered: Cape Town vs Joburg, South Africa T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Cape Town: Dewald Brevis, Ryan Rickelton, Rassie van der Dussen, Grant Roelofsen (wk), Sam Curran, Delano Potgieter, George Linde, Rashid Khan (c), Duan Jansen, Olly Stone, Jofra Archer

Joburg: Reeza Hendricks, Janneman Malan, Faf du Plessis (c), Kyle Verreynne (wk), Lewis Gregory, Donavon Ferreira, Romario Shepherd, George Garton, Alzarri Joseph, Lizaad Williams, Aaron Phangiso

Venue: Newlands, Cape Town

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 2 games.)

First innings average score: 147

Second innings average score: 149

Weather: Clear

Wickets per innings: 5

Wins

Batting first: —

Batting second: 100%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Olly Stone is the only player from Cape Town to have featured in the Ultimate Team in both games.

For Joburg, Alzarri Joseph and Romario Shepherd have been a part of the Ultimate Team on both occasions.

In 17 games at Cape Town, Faf du Plessis has accumulated 519 runs at 33. His last two scores at the venue read 58 and 52*.

For three consecutive T20s, Rashid Khan has gone wicketless. In fact, he has picked only one wicket in his last 5 outings.

Team Cape Town has already launched 19 sixes in only 2 games at Newlands.

The spinners went wicketless in the opening game at Newlands and could manage only 3 wickets in the second. On the other hand, the seamers have taken 18 wickets to their credit.

In comparison to Joburg, Cape Town have more depth and variety in their bowling department.
